Class SuperLevel

java.lang.Object
project.gui.SuperController
project.game.SuperLevel
All Implemented Interfaces:
ILevel
Direct Known Subclasses:
ComputerRoomController, FridgeController, LaboDoorController, LaboratoryController, LivingRoomController
public abstract class SuperLevel
extends SuperController
implements ILevel
Implements logic of a level Controller.

  • Method Details

    • setAllSceneSwitchItems

      public void setAllSceneSwitchItems​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView[] sceneSwitchItems)
      This method loops through all scene switching items and sets a MouseClick-Event on each.
      Specified by:
      setAllSceneSwitchItems in interface ILevel
      Parameters:
      sceneSwitchItems - all items that will change to another scene (EX.: door)

    • setAllMinigameItems

      public void setAllMinigameItems​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView[] minigameItems)
      This method loops through all minigame items and sets a MouseClick-Event on each.
      Specified by:
      setAllMinigameItems in interface ILevel
      Parameters:
      minigameItems - all items that will open a popup-minigame after clicking on it.

    • removeMinigameClickEvent

      public void removeMinigameClickEvent​(javafx.scene.Node node)

    • setAllDescribableItems

      public void setAllDescribableItems​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView[] roomItems, javafx.collections.ObservableList<javafx.scene.Node> inventorySlots)
      This method loops through all describable items and sets a MouseClick-Event on each. An instance of JSONTextManager gets the matching description of the clicked item as a String and it is passed to loadPopup() to open the Popup, which prints out the itemDesc.
      Specified by:
      setAllDescribableItems in interface ILevel
      Parameters:
      roomItems - all items in the room that are being described (ex.: Bin)
      inventorySlots - all imageviews(InventoryItems) in the inventory(Gridpane) that are being described.

    • setAllInventoryItems

      public void setAllInventoryItems​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView[] inventoryItems, boolean removeTile)
      This method loops through all pickable items on the scene and sets a MouseClick-Event on each. Whenever a Node of that array is clicked, it will be added to the inventory and may get removed from the ground(scene) depending on the boolean param.
      Specified by:
      setAllInventoryItems in interface ILevel
      Parameters:
      inventoryItems - is every single item in the scene that can be picked up by the player.
      removeTile - whether or not the item should be removed from the scene.
